text: A coat is a piece of clothing that is worn over a person's upper body. It can be used to keep warm or dry (a raincoat). It also may be worn to make a person look good. A coat usually has long sleeves, and is fastened at the front. Sometimes it includes collars, shoulder straps and hoods. One type of coat is a jacket.https://www.macmillandictionary.com/us/thesaurus- category/american/jackets-and-coats == References == == Other websites == Category:Basic English 850 words Category:Protective clothing
title: Coat
